section.p: The Chu River is spanned by a wooden bridge. It creaks slightly as you set out across it. At the mid-point you are stopped by a female warrior who wears maroon armour over a tunic of black and scarlet silk. She tells you she belongs to the extensive Black Swan family, whose members are famous for their martial prowess.
‘If you wish to cross the bridge you must face me in a duel,’ she says.

choices.choice: Show her an agate swan if you have one
